mapper.select: select model_num, model_name, price, description, password, writeday, readnum, fname, fsize from Electronics
select model_Num, model_Name, price, description,password, writeday, readnum, fname, fsize from Electronics where model_Num=#{modelNum}
mapper.insert: insert into Electronics(model_Num, model_Name, price, description,password, writeday, readnum, fname, fsize) values(#{modelNum},#{modelName},#{price},#{description},#{password}, sysdate,0,#{fname},#{fsize})
mapper.update: update Electronics set readnum = readnum+1 where model_num=#{_parameter}
mapper.delete: delete from Electronics where model_Num=#{modelNum} and password=#{password}
